class_notes:
(Same as CS 485 2)
Prereq of PHYS220 or MATH221 required
course_description: An introduction to qubits, quantum gates, quantum circuits, quantum key distribution, quantum teleportation, quantum dense coding, Grover's search algorithm, Shor's factoring algorithm, quantum entanglement and Bell's theorem, and quantum error correction.
prerequisites: PHYS 220 or MATH 221 or MATH_OX 221 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
schedule_location: MW 5:30pm-6:45pm in Math & Science Center - N302
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 5621, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 5:30-6:45p, Instructor: J. Brody, Status: Closed
